tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA
full_summary:
======================
**Request for Proposal: Professional Services - TBIPS PSIBS Stream 4 (B) Business Services**

**Reference Number:** CB-69-90675400

**Publication Date:** October 13, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 2, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Duration:** November 28, 2023 to March 31, 2029

**Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Daivya Aneja
* Email: [daivya.aneja2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:daivya.aneja2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 571-4316

**Notice Type and Method:**

* This is a request for proposal (RFP) under the Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Agreement.
* The procurement method is competitive, traditional.

**Category and Description:**

* The tender falls under the following categories:
	+ Business and corporate management consultation services (UNDP code: 80101500)
	+ Services de conseils en gestion des entreprises (UNDP code: 80101500)
* The contract is for Business Services-based and Informatics Professional Services.

**Free Trade Agreements:**

* The tender is open to bidders under the following free trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement

**Regions and Delivery:**

* The contract will be delivered within the National Capital Region (NCR)
* The contract will be executed in the Official Languages of Canada.

**Attachments:**

* The notice can be downloaded from the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21992/npp-notice.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21992/npp-notice.pdf) You cannot attach a document
